bullets: Designed and maintained scalable ETL/ELT pipelines using Snowflake, Databricks, PySpark, and Airflow for production data workflows.
Implemented incremental data loading strategies and Delta Lake optimizations to ensure high-performance, cost-efficient processing.
Optimized warehouse performance, query execution, and cluster configurations for reliability and scalability.
Led AI-focused POCs integrating RAG frameworks, RAGAS evaluation, OCR pipelines, and open-source LLM models into data-driven systems.
Built end-to-end AI-driven data solutions integrating NL2SQL and RAG using LangChain, vector embeddings, and Snowflake.
Designed and developed REST APIs with FastAPI and connected them to React-based frontends for full-stack data applications.
Implemented Snowflake data engineering workflows, including data modeling (star schema, fact/dimension design) and warehouse optimization.
Contributed to backend architecture design, documentation, and CI/CD-enabled deployment for scalable, production-ready systems.
